string.name: what_s_new_latest
string.font:
🐞 Bug fixes and performance enhancements 
✨ Enhanced Toast/Snackbar: Now supports swipe to dismiss and expandability 
In Focus 
1. 🎥 In-App Media Player. 
2. Support for various file types: GIF, SVG, etc. 
3. General performance improvements

string.name: what_s_new_20_dev20
string.font:
🌟 Thanks for using our app! ❤️😍 
🌟 Biometric Authentication: Supports Android 9+. 
🌟 UI Updates: We've made improvements to the design and navigation. 
🌟 Introduced Favourites and Recycle Bin in Folders 
🌟 Bug Fixes: We've resolved issues with loading and app lock. 
🌟 Some minor bug fixes
